items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a weak start; US, Asian markets fall
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: US stock indexes closed lower on Wednesday as chip stocks tumbled and investors awaited a host of corporate earnings. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 91.51 points, or 0.22%, to 42,141.54, the S&P 500 lost 19.25 points, or 0.33%, to 5,813.67 and the Nasdaq Composite lost 104.82 points, or 0.56%, to 18,607.93.

items.title: Sirca Paints| Growth at reasonable price| Is it the right time to invest in this stock?
items.description: Sirca Paints is a leading manufacturer of premium Italian wood coating products in India under the brands “Sirca” and “Unico”. Company's last quarterly result was soft due to labor shortages on account of the election and heatwaves in North India. This impacted real estate activities. Margins also dipped due to elevated logistics cost. However, with a focus on high-value products, acquisition of the "Welcome brand" to expand into paint thinners and continued strength in Unico (Wood coating), wall paints, and high-end decorative paints, future looks promising.
